overview: A weekend getaway to your country estate is always a blessing, but this time you won't be going alone. You take Sybil, your beautiful and sensual new girlfriend, to give her a glimpse of the true dimensions of your rich life. Impressed by everything she sees, she opens up to you and shows you how passionate and naughty she is. And so the perfect weekend begins with laughter and love, sex and adventure. An exciting threesome, voyeuristic fun, old love and much more make these two days unforgettable... and that's not all. Come and enjoy your perfect weekend with Sybil.
title: A Perfect Weekend With Sybil
